properties.name: AMBULANCE SERVICE OF MANCHESTER
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512East Center Street (corner of Foster), Manchester, Connecticut I worked here from 1990 to 1995. I started out as the overnight dispatcher, then eventually worked on the ambulance as an Emergency Medical Technician. I enjoyed it so much that I decided to go back to school for Paramedic Studies. The office has since moved to New State Road.

properties.name: AMERICAN MEDICAL RESPONSE
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym0651258 Middletown Avenue, New Haven, CTI\'ve been at AMR since leaving Ambulance Service of Manchester in 1995. AMR offers much better pay and benefits, but you pay the price too. This is a very busy service. I started as a part-time Paramedic, then went full-time within 6 months. In October of 1997 I stopped working on the ambulance and moved inside to the 911 communications center. In 1999, I went part-time again, while I worked full-time for Wallingford Police. I again came back to AMR full-time in September of 2003, only to quit completely in May of 2005. It now appears that I will be returning to AMR shortly on a part-time basis. I guess I can\'t get enough of this place.

properties.name: Chris and John's New House 8-17-07
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym0651244 sylvan hills rd, east haven,ct

properties.name: ExamOne
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512899 silas deane hwy,wethersfield,ctIndependent medical examiner for insurance companies

properties.name: GEORGE SYKES MIDDLE SCHOOL
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512 Park Street, Vernon/Rockville, Connecticut I went to Sykes School only for 6th grade. The school was closed a few years later and is now the Superior Courthouse.

properties.name: KATHY-LYNN'S FLOWERS
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512Talcottville Road, Vernon, Connecticut. I worked at this flower shop with my sis. She did the flower arrangements and I did the deliveries. The owner was a bit of a weirdo and went out of business a few years after we left.

properties.name: KAY-BEE TOYS
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512Tri-City Plaza, Talcottville Road, Vernon, Connecticut I worked here during one holiday season while I was still in high school. They got rid of me right after the new year. I don\'t know if this store is still in the plaza or not.

properties.name: KINDERGARTEN
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512Hartford Turnpike, Vernon, Connecticut I don\'t know what the official name of the school was. It is now the home of the Rockville Historical Society.

properties.name: LAS VEGAS, NEVADA
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512In 1997, I stayed at Harrah\'s with my friend Robbie. Again, in January 2005, my honey and I visited and we stayed at the Stratosphere.

properties.name: LE GOURMET CHEF
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym0651220 Killingworth Turnpike, Clinton, CTClinton Crossing Outlet Stores This is an awesome, awesome store! Christopher and I were part-time holiday help for the 2005 Christmas season. Chris left, but I stayed on until April 2006. I applied for the assistant manager position, but they said I didn\'t have the qualifications. I\'m going to miss those girls! We\'ll have to stop and visit (aka shop).

properties.name: LOS ALTOS, CALIFORNIA
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512In June of 2003, I finally visited the west coast, thanks to an invitation from my second cousins. I also spent several days in San Francisco and a day in Napa Valley.

properties.name: MANCHESTER COMMUNITY COLLEGE
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512161 Hillstown Road, Manchester,CTJust took a couple courses here right after high school, then another a few years after Paramedic school.

properties.name: MANCHESTER MEMORIAL HOSPITAL
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512 71 Haynes Street, Manchester, CTMY BIRTHPLACE: I was burfed here on May 18th, 1969. EMPLOYMENT: Later in life (1992-1995), I would return here to work in the Emergency Room and teach CPR.

properties.name: MCDONALDS
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym0651289 TALCOTTVILLE ROAD,VERNON,CTYES! I actually worked here for about 2 months during my junior year of high school. Hey, I got lots of free food while I was alone in the little booth for the drive-thru.

properties.name: MY 1st APARTMENT
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512 42 talcott ave,vernon,ct42 Talcott Avenue, 2nd floor, Vernon/Rockville, CT I lived here for 2 years (1993-1995).

properties.name: MY 1st HOUSE
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512 600 LAUREL ST, EAST HAVEN,CT600 Laurel Street, East Haven, Connecticut I purchased my first house in July of 1996 and spent the next 7 years completely remodeling the inside of the house and the detached garage. Of course there\'s always something that needs fixing. Christopher moved into the house with me in Spring of 2004. We\'re both working on some exterior projects now.

properties.name: MY 2nd APARTMENT
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512 7 drummond dr,rocky hill,ctCentury Hills Apartments, 7J Drummond Drive, Rocky Hill, Connecticut Nice apartment, but I was commuting 30 minutes to work in New Haven and I figured that a mortgage would be cheaper than the rent. I lived here for 1 year (July of 1995 to June of 1996), then I moved to East Haven.

properties.name: MY CHILDHOOD HOME
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512 29 sunset terrace,vernon,ctSunset Terrace, Vernon, Connecticut I lived here until 1993, when I got my 1st apartment on Talcott Avenue. Mom & Dad still live here.

properties.name: NAPA VALLEY, CALIFORNIA
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512During my 2003 visit to the San Francisco Bay area, I spend a day in the "wine country". Just drive up route 29, and you will find one winery after another. Or if you don\'t want to drink and drive, take the steam train. One of the most beautiful places I\'ve ever seen (and best wine I\'ve tasted). I would consider spending an entire vacation here.

properties.name: NURSERY SCHOOL
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512 This is the little red nursery school I went to. I can\'t even remember the name of the place or the exact address, but I remember where it is.

properties.name: Porter and Chester Institute
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512132 Weymouth Road, Enfield, CTI went here from 1988 thru 1989 for the Career Electronics Program.

properties.name: ROCKVILLE HIGH SCHOOL
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512 70 Loveland Hill Road, Vernon, CTAttended from 1983-1987. Some of the most awkward years of my life.

properties.name: SAINT FRANCIS HOSPITAL
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512 114 Woodland Street, Hartford, CTIn cooperation with Capital (formerly Greater Hartford) Community College, conducted my Paramedic Studies program from 1991-1992.

properties.name: SAN FRANCISCO, CALIFORNIA
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512During my California trip of 2003, I saw Golden Gate, Alcatraz (from the shore), downtown, the Castro, Haight-Ashbury, and lots of cable cars. I also had lunch on the "other side" of the bridge in Sausalito.

properties.name: SANTA CRUZ, CALIFORNIA
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512The map marker shows the exact spot where I dipped my big toe into the Pacific Ocean. I never thought that California would be so cold in the middle of June, so NO I didn\'t go swimming. There were lots of cute surfer boys, but unfortunately they all had those full-body neoprene suits. What fun is that?

properties.name: SNOW'S ELECTRONICS
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512Talcottville Road, Vernon, Connecticut I worked/apprenticed here for a year and a half, during and after I completed electronics school. The business moved 3 or 4 times and has since closed.

properties.name: ST. JOHNSBURY, VT
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512My only childhood vacation spot. My parents are from here and most of my extended family lives here. We owned a plot of land here for awhile, but we didn\'t use it very often.

properties.name: THE HOME DEPOT
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512111 Universal Drive N,North Haven, CTI worked here for 8 whole hours!!! Although my expertise was in electrical, they decided to put me in lumber. After 8 hours of lifting 2x6\'s and plywood all day, I decided I should look for a different job. I never went back.

properties.name: Town of Madison
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym065129 campus dr,madison,ct911 Dispatch from Police Department headquarters

properties.name: U.S. VIRGIN ISLANDS
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512I travelled with my friends Heather and Colleen in 1993 to St. Thomas and St. John. In August of 2005, I had my honeymoon on St. Croix.

properties.name: VERNON CENTER MIDDLE SCHOOL
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512 777 HARTFORD TURNPIKE, VERNON, CTI went to VCMS for grades 7 & 8. This school now handles grades 6-8.

properties.name: VERNON ELEMENTARY SCHOOL
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512 375 Hartford Turnpike, Vernon, CTI attended grades 1 thru 5 here. And, YES, I used to WALK to school! Do you see how FAR this is from my house? This isn\'t a school anymore... it\'s a professional building and the YMCA. My optician\'s office is in this building.

properties.name: VINCENT'S PHARMACY
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512 Union Street, Vernon/Rockville, Connecticut. I worked here during my senior year of high school delivering prescriptions. They moved a few years ago to East Main Street.

properties.name: WALLINGFORD POLICE DEPARTMENT
properties.description: Posted by Johnnym06512135 North Main Street, Wallingford, CTFrom June 1999 thru August 2003. I must say, this was probably my favorite place to work, but unfortunately my body could not longer handle the rotating shifts.
